faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our web development and AI automation services

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Web development projects typically take 2-6 weeks, while AI automation implementations range from 1-4 weeks. Complex integrated solutions may take 6-12 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during our consultation.

items.question: What's included in ongoing maintenance?
items.answer: Our maintenance includes security updates, performance monitoring, bug fixes, content updates, and 24/7 technical support. We also provide monthly reports and optimization recommendations.

items.question: Do you work with international clients?
items.answer: Yes! We work with clients worldwide. Our team operates across multiple time zones to ensure effective communication and project delivery regardless of your location.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the results?
items.answer: We offer unlimited revisions during the development phase and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll work until you are or provide a full refund.

items.question: Can you integrate with our existing systems?
items.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in seamless integrations with CRMs, ERPs, payment systems, and other business tools. We'll assess your current setup and create custom solutions that work with your existing infrastructure.

items.question: Do you provide training for our team?
items.answer: Yes! We provide comprehensive training sessions, documentation, and video tutorials to ensure your team can effectively use and maintain the systems we build for you.
